chapter.title: Working with OpenStack Networking with Neutron

section.title: Considerations for OpenStack Networking
section.para: There are many different drivers for OpenStack Networking, that range from software bridges to full control of certain switching hardware. This guide focuses on the simplest: the Linux Bridge. However, the theories presented here should be mostly applicable to other mechanisms.

warning.para: If you have followed the previous section on setting up networking for your compute node using nova-network, this will override those settings.
